name: BBOS (Alpha)
description:
Hi, player!

BBOS (bobbone / operating system) - a Webcore and Dreamcore style game. it's kind of "game console" from the Bobbone Corporation. It has five mini-games: 

SHOOTER_GAME_1999, 

SPACE_RACE_1998, 

QUEST_GAME_1999, 

MONO_1999, 

LABYRINTH_1995. 

Mini-games will be added with every update of the game, and maybe you can learn more about this game and the Bobbone Corporation and BBOS.

CONTROLS

Arrows - cursor and player control in minigames.

Enter - confirm

Z and X in minigame SHOOTER_GAME_1999 - shoot left or right

Z in minigame SPACE_RACE_1998 - shoot.

Escape - back to BBOS

Have fun!
